title: Why is the league patcher so slow
body: I stopped play LoL for like a few months and I come back to play but it downloads a 1.7GB patch at 50kbps when my internet download speed is 30mbps according to speedtest.net. I have never had a problem like this in my 5 years of playing LoL. I uninstalled and redownloaded LoL but it just downloads the patcher and not the actual game so that did nothing. Repair does nothing cos this is my internet speed not corrupt files

replies.body:
Hey Scorpeanna,

The patcher can be slow for a variety of reasons, including the speed of writing files and server load. The next time you encounter slow patching speeds, I would recommend trying a VPN like Hotspot Shield while patching your client. It might be faster, but no guarantees. Good luck!
